meanings: in the intervals of one´s work
when one has a spare moment (from one´s work)
in spare moments from one´s work

vlive.korean: 방금 일하는 목소리 맞죠? That was a working tone, right? 듣기 View video Park Bo Young : 연락👋🏼
vlive.english: That was a working tone, right?

vlive.korean: 그럼 너의 마음이 너무 일하는 느낌 아니야? Then won't you feel like you're working? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 15. 겉바속촉 회기파전 아님! 경희대vs한국외대의 회기파戰에 낀 성균관! 그 결과는?
vlive.english: Then won't you feel like you're working?

vlive.korean: 아니 바에서 일하는 사람이 쉬는 날 가고 싶은 데가 또 술집이에요? You're working at a bar and you want to drink on your day off? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 존잘 연하가 선배 꼬시는 법 [엑스엑스(XX)] - EP.05
vlive.english: You're working at a bar and you want to drink on your day off?

vlive.korean: 여기는 일하는 덴데 왜 이렇게 지저분하지? It's the office. Why does it look so messy? 듣기 View video Leap Now by Yeonjae Son : [손연재] 갈라쇼 연습 공개! 🤗 (ft. Vlive 채널 OPEN 축하)
vlive.english: It's the office. Why does it look so messy?

vlive.korean: 근데 너 재현이 형이랑 패션 쪽으로 일하는 거 아니야? Aren't you working on fashion with Jaehyun? 듣기 View video 렛스튜디오 (LETstudio) : [겨울방학] Ep03 썸과 어색의 사이
vlive.english: Aren't you working on fashion with Jaehyun?
